thread.title: ‘Flip or Flop’ star coping with divorce in a bikini | Page Six
thread.title_full: ‘Flip or Flop’ star coping with divorce in a bikini | Page Six

author: Jessica Sager
title: ‘Flip or Flop’ star coping with divorce in a bikini | Page Six
text:
A post shared by Christina El Moussa (@christinaelmoussa) on Mar 23, 2017 at 12:01pm PDT 
By the looks of it, “ Flip or Flop ” star Christina El Moussa likely won’t stay single for long.
The HGTV fixture flaunted her figure in a bikini for L*Space Swim on Thursday, accompanied by daughter Taylor, 6, and her new French bulldog puppy, Cash.
A post shared by Cash The Frenchie (@cashiethefrenchbulldog) on Mar 22, 2017 at 2:00pm PDT 
“Exercise is my stress reliever. There is nothing like a good three-mile run for me to really clear my head and get my endorphins going,” Christina, who separated from husband and “Flip or Flop” co-host Tarek in May 2016, told People .
“My other go-to is yoga,” Christina, 33, added. “I have the most amazing private instructor who has changed my life. Our sessions are very spiritual and have really helped me cope with my divorce and other emotions I’m going through during this time. I love it so much, it’s inspired me to take a trip to Bali this summer. I can’t wait!”
Tarek, 35, filed for divorce from Christina in January. Tarek confirmed in February that Christina was dating contractor Gary Anderson , but she insists she’s currently flying solo.
A post shared by L*Space by Monica Wise (@lspaceswim) on Mar 23, 2017 at 9:22am PDT 
  WhatsApp Email Copy
